article_title: Obamacare's Co-Ops: A Bigger Scandal Than Solyndra?

article_metadata.description: The decline and bankruptcy of insurance co-ops conceived by Obamacare is being trumpeted as another emblem of the law’s many failures. But the fiasco speaks to a much more parochial flaw that animates progressive views on healthcare. The co-ops aren’t dying only because they were hastily constructed, or poorly managed. Their disaster is [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
